titleStmt.title: The Scots beaten with their own weapons, and their playing fast and loose with King and Parliament clearly discovered. Which may serve also for a full (and briefe) answer to the Scots last large papers. Published for the satisfaction both of city and countrey, concerning the King and the Scots. Imprimatur Gilbert Mabbot.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.C. for H.C. in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
